name: template
summary: The `<template>` HTML element is a mechanism for holding HTML that is not to be rendered immediately when a page is loaded but may be instantiated subsequently during runtime using JavaScript.
contentCategories: Metadata content, flow content, phrasing content, script-supporting element
permittedParents: Any element that accepts metadata content, phrasing content, or script-supporting elements. Also allowed as a child of a colgroup element that does not have a span attribute.
